title: The fucking lack of basic understanding going down right now is amazing
body:
People can't be getting their main role any less than they used to be.

There are the same number of mid players, and the same number of possible mid positions.

This hasn't changed.

The difference now is you can't get stuck in your shittiest role if you don't want to be.

edit: oh and also you don't get 2 support mains randomly stuck in the same queue, so it's actually more likely people will get their main role.
